oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: All Star Western Theatre - 1947-07-12 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of All Star Western Theatre radio program from July 12, 1947. Featuring Foy Willing and the Riders Of The Purple Sage, with announcer Terry O'Sullivan.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Foy Willing; Riders Of The Purple Sage
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Radio play 'Loco Louis And The Eastern Dude' [continued from part 1] -- Weber's Bread commercial -- Terry O'Sullivan introduces the Riders Of The Purple Sage -- Where The Cool Clear Water Spills (Foy Willing and the Riders Of The Purple Sage) -- Closing statement (Foy Willing) -- Theme (Drifting Along, Singing A Song) -- Closing statement (Terry O'Sullivan) -- Station announcements
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: KNX (Radio station : Los Angeles, Calif.); All star western theatre (Radio program); O'Sullivan, Terry, 1915-2006; Willing, Foy, 1914-1978; Riders of the Purple Sage; Sloey, Al; Paul, Johnny (Violinist); Harrell, Scotty; Wilson, Ray (Writer); Hargus, Tom (Director); DuVal, Joe, 1906-; Howard, Fred, 1896-1990; Temple, Alvina
